info.abstract:
[Type] Metadata Access
[Behaviour] Request or set the service status.
[Parameters] - status : new service status, 'up' or 'down'. - level : use level "1" (default) to ask for service status only; use level "2" to ask for job list.
[System parameters] - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output). service_status : show service status as text; service_tasks : show the list of running tasks.
[Examples] Enable the service: OPH_TERM: oph_service status=up; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_service;status=up;"
